Description: The people management platform that helps fast-growing companies bring out the best in their employees.
Name: bob HR

Methods.Name: List Company People
Methods.Description: Returns a list of all active people of the company, data is filtered based on the access level of the logged-in user.

Methods.Name: Employee Joined
Methods.Description: Triggered when employee start date has occurred.

Methods.Name: Employee Left
Methods.Description: Triggered when employee termination date has occurred.

Methods.Name: Employee Created
Methods.Description: Triggered when an employee is created.

Methods.Name: Employee Updated
Methods.Description: Triggered when an employee is updated.
